website_summaries.verdict: Most popular coconut-flavored protein powder on the market, thanks to a great flavor and clean taste.
pros: Works nicely as a complete health supplement, combining protein, carbs, and healthy fats in a single powder, while limiting sugars
Delivers 24 grams of protein per serving
Recently underwent a formula change to enhance the taste
Whey protein is fully derived from 100% grass-fed cattle
cons: Price per ounce is higher than most of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Warnig: Consuming this product...
customer_reviews.text: I got the package today, July 10 2019 and I noticed that there is a warning that "consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause birth defects and other reproductive harm..." so WHY ON EARTH THEY ARE ADDING CHEMICALS TO THIS, ARE THEY NECESSARY TO KILL CLIENTS....????
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Nel Ospina

customer_reviews.title: Best Coconut Flavored Protein Powder I Can Fine
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble finding a decent low sugar coconut flavored protein powder. I use this in smoothies and in my oatmeal and it is the best one that I can find. It is not too chalky and has a good coconut flavor. I had bought the single packets and have been resisting buying the large one because it was so expensive, but this is a nice big package and should last awhile. I will buy it again. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 are: this one (like all of that contain stevia) does have the "stevia aftertaste" and the price is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder. Seems to keep me full longer. Super delicious in a smoothie with 8 oz water, 2 handfuls of greens, a banana, and a scoop of Fuel! It’s actually my go to breakfast. Switch it up and add pineapple instead of the banana. Not as many carbs a for a workout, but tastes like a Pina Colada!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.Den

customer_reviews.title: It tastes pretty darn good for everything that isn't in it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using SFH products for six years. It tastes pretty darn good for everything that isn't in it! I've used this one for the last two years. I use this product before or after a long swim and as a meal on the go. I always mix it with unsweetened almond milk. It's easy to add what you like to make it your own. The product does not mix as well in liquid as it once did so I mix, shake, leave it, shake again and drink.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: Product Defect
customer_reviews.text: I received this protein and it was opened and spilled all over the box. I am not able to return this product and I'd like a new protein to be sent as I will not be using this defective, opened product. This is the second time ordering this product from the seller and the first time I ordered it I did not have any issues. This protein is expensive and I shouldn't have to use an opened product. I hope the seller sees this review and sends another- I will then update this review, but until then, just know that you cannot return this product and mine came like this.
customer_reviews.author: lauren rivera

customer_reviews.title: Clean burning muscle fuel
customer_reviews.text: This is far and away the best protein supplement on the market. I mostly blend this in my morning coffee and have another scoop following my training sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Rut

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the sweetener, wish it were unsweetened
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I’m a big fan of coconut and wanted to introduce a protein my diet. I’ve tried it in protein powder pancakes and thought it was great. However, I should have looked at the ingredients closer. I really hate the taste of stevia, and it comes through very strongly if I mix the powder in other things like yogurt or oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Barbera

customer_reviews.title: I truly enjoy SHF Fuel
customer_reviews.text: I truly enjoy SHF Fuel! Everyday I drink this before or after a workout and when I wake, I am not sore or exhausted. This product really works for those who workout daily to those who need more energy/motivation to work out. It is great for lean muscle and helps you build up better immunity. It is a magically product that I recommend to anyone who wants and needs to get healthy and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality protein
customer_reviews.text: I am a consistent user of SFH products; the coconut FUEL is my favorite. It's the perfect protein for my morning smoothie. I find it blends much better than Jocko's Molk or Paleoethics. Also a plus one that it's produced rather local to me (in Maine) so I feel as if I'm continuing to help out my neighbors in the New England economy. Overall a big ol' thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shake! Mild coconut flavor. Makes me feel like it’s a naughty shake but so delicious. I make protein bites with it as well. Yum!!
customer_reviews.author: CowGirlUPMA

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Used this several times before. Love the flavor and the fact it makes a perfect pre-workout drink for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and doesn't make me sick like most others. No strange aftertaste like most others and not sickeningly sweet. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lees

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best tasting protein on the market. It's actually the only one I can stand. Tastes amazing and I actually look forward to drinking it. It takes awesome in almond milk or in my daily smoothies. My son even likes it in his oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: BlindMama

customer_reviews.title: I don't like protein powders - but I like this one!
customer_reviews.text: Someone from my gym recommended this brand of protein powder when I complained about all the others I tried. Specifically, the coconut flavor was recommended. I liked the fact that the list of ingredients was minimal and I found that I actually liked the taste. I've put it in smoothies and oatmeal and both are good! I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn May

customer_reviews.title: Another great SFH product
customer_reviews.text: Another great SFH product. I love the taste when i mix it with coconut water. The benefits as a preworkout drink is noticeable on those hard Crossfit days.
customer_reviews.author: David P Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few years. Tastes delicious, blends perfectly with just liquid or with fruit and veggies. Does not cause any intestinal issues like other products might do. It DOES NOT get overly thick and goopy if you can't drink it fast enough. :) All flavors are delicious but I love the coconut the best. Enjoy!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good whey taste good the coconut taste like I am on holiday in Caribbean

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder available!
customer_reviews.text: Best protein powder available. Organic and grass fed cows for high quality protein. Plus, the flavors are great. I’ve only tried coconut and vanilla - both are awesome. The beauty of those two flavors is they are a great base for use with any fruit in making a protein shake. Also, these dissolve well in water - just shake well. Flavor is great and only a very little bit of graininess - perfect if you’re cutting out dairy. SFH protein powders are the only protein powders that my wife and I can both agree on.
customer_reviews.author: E. Youngstrom

customer_reviews.title: This is product for me!
customer_reviews.text: This products really is the best for me. Quality ingredients and mixes well regardless of using cold or hot liquid. When my last supply of SFH Whey Protein Powder was exhausted, I thought it was a good time to try other like products. Boy, that was a expensive experiment. Have opened, full bags in Keto cupboard I’ll not use, as I have turned back to SFH product and forgotten all the rest. I doubt you will be disappointed if you give SFH Whey Protein a try.
customer_reviews.author: Smile2

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with less nonsense ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it before my crossfit workouts. It provides what I need for energy without weighing me down and without a bunch of ingredients I don't need. I like the taste, it has a mild coconut flavor.
customer_reviews.author: rocks

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I mix the whey protein with a veggie/fruit smoothie for my lunch each day. The coconut flavor adds to the drink. And, while the sack of whey protein lasts for quite a while, I do wish the price was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Penque

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and is an exceptional protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this protein powder! It mixes easily and tastes great even with only water. I have also added cinnamon to this coconut flavor and it creates another fantastic option for a pre or post workout meal. I’m very particular about supplements and know how important it is to fuel the body daily for optimal results. I use this about 2-3 times every day between meals.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste - Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I mix it with coconut water and some frozen organic strawberries (Costco) and put it in a vitamix for about 30 seconds on high. Tastes great and I'm building muscle. What else could you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: RustyNails

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder that finally tastes good! I enjoy this most mornings in a green ...
customer_reviews.text: Protein powder that finally tastes good! I enjoy this most mornings in a green smoothie of sorts. It blends well and tastes great. I wish it was subscribe and save...it is a regular Updated on 6/6 - it is a subscribe and save now! whoop whoop! I am a repeat customer and have recommended this product to my family who also is a repeat customer.

product_meta.title: Fuel Whey Protein Powder (Coconut) by SFH | Great Tasting Grass Fed Whey | MCTs & Fiber for Energy | All Natural | Soy Free, Gluten Free, No RBST, No Artificial Flavors | 28 Servings (2 lb Bag)
feature_bullets: CLEANEST ENERGY ON THE MARKET: Skip the sugary energy drink and processed protein bars with heavy carbs to help you get through the day. SFH FUEL is a great option for natural energy - great in the morning or if you want to avoid taking pre-workout. SFH Fuel is a combination of protein, fat and carbohydrates good for all of your daily activities. Use as an on the go supplement or before your workout
ADDITIONAL NUTRITION: SFH FUEL combines whey protein, coconut milk powder, and apple pectin to give you energy to FUEL your day. Made with No Soy, No Gluten, No RBST, No ArtificIal Flavors

GRASS FED COWS: Our whey is derived from grass fed, free range cows that are never treated with antibiotics or bovine growth hormones. Our cows are ethically treated and raised on the greenest pastures in New Zealand & Australia, which is the only place in the world where it's possible for them to be grass fed outside all year round

TRUST WHAT’S IN THE BAG:There’s nothing to hide when the ingredients are this clean. The protein is naturally high in BCAA's and minimally processed leaving all of these health benefits fully intact. Just pure goodness, nothing added

INCREDIBLE COCONUT TASTE: Your energy drink has never tasted so good! Mix it in a protein shake or bake into other protein foods for an added energy boost. As a dietary supplement, mix one scoop with 6 to 8oz of water or your favorite beverage
